name: Flight Rush!
description:
Do you want to have a realistic airplane experience with unique graphics?
Rewrite the physic rules of flying!
A new plane at every height, complete its evolution and be the winner!
Raise your height by passing through the green doors and earn more coins!
Upgrade your rockets with the money you earn!
Get the maximum rockets and reach the moon!
Are you skilled enough to complete unique levels?
Dodge the red doors to prove that you are the best pilot in the world.
